name: Smile challenge
content: During one hour smile at everyone you pass by

name: Small talk
content: Speak with people you see often to, e.g receptionist at work

name: The voice
content: Sing loudly in your room, in the shower and in the kitchen, Make your voice heard.

name: Talk in the shop
content: Engage in conversations with people in shops “how is your day?”

name: Call the manager
content: Call up a company up to inquire about something (at home)

name: Call a person
content: Call someone you know that you haven’t spoken to for a chat

name: Direction
content: Ask a stranger on the street for directions/time

name: posture
content: Look at your posture in mirror and practice talking with your hands

name: Shop conversation
content: Ask someone in a shop for help and then engage them in conversation

name: new gym class
content: Do a new class at the gym and talk to the instructor about it.

name: restaurent recommendation
content: Engage a stranger in further conversation, for example asking for recommendation for a good restaurant.

name: flash outfit
content: Wear a bold outfit/bright lip colour and make people look at you

name: Suggest idea
content: Suggest a new idea to your boss. Speak confidently and slowly

name: Lunch with colleague
content: Ask colleague to go for lunch with you and don’t take your phone so you have to engage in conversation

name: meetup
content: Go to a ‘meet up’ group on your own and talk to people.

name: Gym conversation
content: Speak to three people at gym

name: Leader
content: Arrange a meeting at work and lead it

name: Have a lunch
content: Ask an acquaintance out for lunch and engage in conversation

name: Phone complaint
content: Ring a company and make a complaint

name: Stop Sorry
content: Don’t use the word sorry ALL DAY

name: Eat alone
content: Eat in a restaurant on your own

name: Speak with people
content: Speak to 3 new people today

name: Be funny
content: Tell a joke in front of a big group of people

name: Know your colleague
content: Spend lunch getting to know a colleague

name: Speaking course
content: Book a public speaking course

name: Coffe shop
content: Go to a coffee shop and read a book for a few hours. Speak to 3 people.

name: Social event
content: Go to a social event on your own and talk to 3 new people

name: Dancing time !
place: In a bar or a club
content: Go for a night out SOBER and dance and talk to people

name: Giving is caring
content: Give $5 to Five Random People

name: Greeting game
content: Greet people at cofee

name: Dating time
content: Ask a girl/guy out to Dinner

name: Rate my look (please)
content: Ask Strangers to Rate My Look

name: Hello stranger
content: Say hello to people you come across

name: Be nice
content: Genuinely compliment someone

name: Dare to critisize
content: Say a constructive critisism to someone

name: Meet with people
content: Ask someone you like for a date

name: Say NO!
content: Say no to a proposition you don't like

name: The speeker
content: Speak in front of a large audience

name: Listen to people
content: Have a conversation solely about the other person's interests

name: Take a pic'
content: Pictures with Strangers

name: Charity
content: Get Donation For Charity on The Street

name: Express yourself
content: Express a need

name: Make a plan
content: Plan an outside activity with your relatives

name: The chatter
content: Start a conversation with your relatives

name: Dare to watch
content: Ask 2 of your relative to go to the cinema with you

name: Walk together
content: Ask 2 of your relative to go for a walk in a park

name: Let's have a drink
content: Ask 2 of your relative to go have a drink in a bar

name: Meet other darer
content: Meet a stranger and talk with him

name: Come to me
content: Meet a stranger at your place

name: Let's do something
content: Ask a stranger to do an activity with you

name: Have a drink
content: Meet a stranger at the bar

name: Share your feeling
content: Talk to a stranger about one your problem

name: High five !
content: Meet a stranger and high-five him

name: Practice together
content: Ask a stranger to have a sport session with you
